introShort: Access healthcare services, find doctors, and get support for your health needs.
tts_intro: Here are important health services and tips.

emergency.title: Emergency & Urgent Help
emergency.subtitle: Call 144 for medical emergencies
emergency.tip: For medical emergencies, call 144. Have your address ready and speak slowly.

findDoctor.title: Find a Doctor
findDoctor.subtitle: How to see a doctor in Austria
findDoctor.tip: Bring your e-card and ID to any doctor. Call ahead to make an appointment.

mentalHealth.title: Mental Health Support
mentalHealth.subtitle: Counseling and psychological help
mentalHealth.tip: Mental health support is available. Call 142 for crisis support or contact your local health center.

children.title: Children & Pediatric Care
children.subtitle: Child health services and doctors
children.tip: Children's health services include regular checkups and vaccinations. Find a pediatrician in your area.

trustedContacts.title: Trusted Contacts & NGOs
trustedContacts.subtitle: Organizations that can help
trustedContacts.tip: Many NGOs provide health support for migrants and refugees. Contact local health advocacy groups.

healthSystem.title: Health System in Austria
healthSystem.subtitle: Understanding Austrian healthcare
healthSystem.tip: Austria has universal healthcare. Register with your local health insurance to get an e-card.

physicalHealth.title: Physical Health
physicalHealth.subtitle: General health and wellness
physicalHealth.tip: Regular checkups and preventive care are covered by insurance. Stay active and eat well.

wantToTalk.title: Do you want to talk?
wantToTalk.subtitle: Someone to listen and support you
wantToTalk.tip: If you need someone to talk to, call 142 or visit a local counseling center.

urgentHelp.title: Immediate Help
urgentHelp.subtitle: When you need help right now
urgentHelp.tip: For urgent medical help, go to the nearest hospital emergency room or call 144.

crisisSupport.title: Mental Health Crisis Support
crisisSupport.subtitle: 24/7 crisis intervention
crisisSupport.tip: Crisis hotlines are available 24/7. Call 142 for immediate mental health support.

prescriptions.title: Prescriptions & Pharmacy
prescriptions.subtitle: Getting medicines and pharmacy basics
prescriptions.tip: Take your prescription to any pharmacy (Apotheke). Emergency pharmacies are open at night.

vaccinations.title: Vaccinations & Prevention
vaccinations.subtitle: Immunizations and preventive care
vaccinations.tip: Childhood vaccinations are free. Adults can get travel vaccines and annual flu shots.

reproductive.title: Reproductive & Sexual Health
reproductive.subtitle: Maternal health and family planning
reproductive.tip: Gynecologists provide reproductive health services. Pregnancy care is covered by insurance.

genderViolence.title: Violence Support
genderViolence.subtitle: Help for gender-based violence
genderViolence.tip: If you experience violence, call the women's helpline 0800 222 555 or go to a safe place.

chronicCare.title: Chronic Conditions Care
chronicCare.subtitle: Diabetes, hypertension, ongoing care
chronicCare.tip: Chronic disease management includes regular monitoring and medication. Work with your doctor on a care plan.

dental.title: Dental & Vision Care
dental.subtitle: Teeth and eye health services
dental.tip: Basic dental care is partially covered. Eye exams and glasses may need additional insurance.

addiction.title: Addiction & Substance Support
addiction.subtitle: Help with substance use problems
addiction.tip: Addiction treatment is confidential and available. Contact local addiction counseling centers.

disability.title: Disability & Rehabilitation
disability.subtitle: Support for disabilities and recovery
disability.tip: Disability services include assistive devices and rehabilitation programs. Apply through social services.

healthRights.title: Health Rights & Entitlements
healthRights.subtitle: Your rights in the healthcare system
healthRights.tip: You have the right to quality healthcare, interpreters, and respectful treatment regardless of status.

logistics.title: Practical Health Logistics
logistics.subtitle: Transport, costs, registration help
logistics.tip: Healthcare costs are mostly covered with insurance. Public transport to hospitals is usually available.

publicHealth.title: Public Health Alerts
publicHealth.subtitle: Seasonal advice and safety tips
publicHealth.tip: Follow public health guidance for seasonal illnesses and safety. Check local health department updates.
